channel.title: I2C config object bug
channel.description:
hi, I was looking at the I2C config object code and detected a little mistake with GPIO init VS dispose.
I2C pins (GPIOB,8/9) are at code.init but at code.dispose the wrong GPIOS were selected (GPIOA,8/9).

item.title: I2C config object bug
item.dc:creator: @paul
item.description:
@paul wrote:

hi,
I was looking at the I2C config object code and detected a little mistake with GPIO init VS dispose.

I2C pins (GPIOB,8/9) are at code.init but at code.dispose the wrong GPIOS were selected (GPIOA,8/9).

Read full topic
